import ScalableUnits from './ScalableUnits?dev-site-examples';

# Scalable units

<Notice variant="caution" ariaLevel="2">
<p>The supported units for width props are <b>px</b>, <b>em</b>, and <b>rem</b>.</p>
<p>The width units should be consistent across all the props in the same component, including column <b>width</b>, <b>minWidth</b>, and <b>maxWidth</b> passed through the columns array.</p>
<p>The width units incosistent with the rest of the component props will be disregarded.</p>
</Notice>

### Description

This example demonstrates a [Compact Interactive List](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about) placed within a container with `fontSize: 1.2em` and all width props set in units relative to the font size: 

<ScalableUnits />
